name: Blackout Escape
description:
Play as a now powerless vampire caught in a trap inside of a basement; because of a misunderstanding his Sire was killed by someone unknown. For this he will be unjustly accused of the crime by the Camarilla, they will imprison him awaiting his sentence. Escape the underground prison despite the blackout using your own wit and strength, and avoid the merciless jailer.
